pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical resistant gloves made of barrier laminate, butyl rubber, nitrile rubber, neoprene rubber, polyvinyl chloride or Viton; Shoes plus socks

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: No specific antidote is available. All treatments should be based on observed signs and symptoms of distress in the patient. Over exposure to materials other than this product may have occurred.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 150 grams of NAA (22.8 fl oz) per acre per year
